arts.ttl: MN: Curva Sud will return to chanting during Lecce vs. Milan – banners also allowed
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Finally, some good news for AC Milan. Curva Sud have announced that they will return to chanting and singing during tonight’s game against Lecce, bringing banners and flags as well. For the games against Bari (Coppa Italia) and Cremonese, both played at San Siro, the atmosphere was rather strange as Curva Sud were completely silent. arts.ttl: Lecce vs AC Milan – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Lecce and AC Milan go head-to-head in Serie A on Friday evening. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to the 2025/26 campaign, with Milan desperately needing to bounce back from their shocking opening-day defeat to Cremonese. Lecce vs AC Milan – Match Preview and Team News Date: 29th August, Friday. Kick-off: 7:45pm BST. arts.ttl: AC Milan XI vs Lecce – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AC Milan continue their Serie A campaign when they travel to face Lecce on Friday evening. The Rossoneri are looking to bounce back from a disappointing 2-1 home defeat to newly-promoted Cremonese in their season opener and desperately need three points to kickstart their campaign under Massimiliano Allegri. arts.ttl: AC Milan to bounce back against Lecce
arts.sum: In the last 7 matches between Lecce and Milan in Salento, both teams have always scored: 29 goals in total, an average of over 4 goals per game, 12 for the Giallorossi and 17 for the Rossoneri. 14 matches between Eusebio Di Francesco and Massimiliano Allegri, and Milan coach is ahead with 10 wins.
